techmeme.title: Apple adds an Apple News Live Activity widget to track the 2024 US election results in real time on iPhone and iPad lock screens and the Apple Watch widget view (Wesley Hilliard/AppleInsider)
In its annual report, Apple warns of future products perhaps never exceeding the iPhone's profitability, "geopolitical tensions", and AI features' safety risks (Financial Times)
Amazon receives FAA approval to fly its newer, smaller delivery drones, including beyond pilots' line of sight, and aims to ramp up deliveries near Phoenix (Annie Palmer/CNBC)
GlobalFoundries reports Q3 revenue down 6% YoY to $1.7B and expects Q4 revenue of $1.8B-$1.85B, vs. $1.8B est., driven by smartphone chip demand; GFS jumps 11%+ (Harshita Mary Varghese/Reuters)
India issues a notice to Wikipedia over bias concerns, questioning if it should be classified as a publisher, after judges called its open editing "dangerous" (Manish Singh/TechCrunch)
